RelatedSentence: Suffolk County police are investigating a bank robbery that occurred in Farmingville Monday afternoon .
Police said a man entered the Teachers Federal Credit Union branch at 2410 N. Ocean Ave .

at about 3:40 p.m. The suspect approached a teller , produced a note demanding cash and fled on foot .
He had a goatee and was wearing tan - colored pants and a dark hooded sweatshirt , police said .
